job.title: Data Scientist, Client Services
job.description: strongWe Breathe Life Into DatabrbrstrongAt Komodo Health our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease Smarter use of data is essential to this mission We combine the worlds most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map the industrys most precise view of the US healthcare system With the Healthcare Map as our foundation we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industrybrbrOur people are the center of our success We are a smart supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing whats broken in healthcare Its fun challenging and important Join usbrbrstrongThe Opportunity at Komodo HealthbrbrstrongThe Life Science Services teams mission is to support Life Science customers and products through custom applications of our healthcare map along with actionable insights that enable Komodo to meet our business goalsbrbrOur data scientists help build analytics pipelines and complex logic for complicated data projects that solve tangible customer use casesbrbrstrongLooking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health you will havebrstrongulliDelivered highvalue data analytics projects that our existing data products could not cover liliWorked with Product to help prototype new analytics offeringsliliEffectively partnered with customerfacing teams to reconcile client requirements with the capabilities of datasets available at KHliliIncorporated a good understanding of the healthcare datasets at Komodo and client usecases to effectively partner with data engineering teams for architectural decisionsliliCreated a plan with the team to scale our solutions automate code and centralize complex logic Advocated for good engineering practices within the team like documentation and code reusabilityliliPresented findings insights and analytical results to internal partners for client deliveries as well as the larger DS function for continued growth and learningbrliulstronguWhat You Bring To KomodobrustrongulliKeenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervisionliliExperience writing SQL queries and working with Relational Databases and Proficient in scripting with PythonliliAbility to work well both independently and collaboratively in a fastpaced and demanding agile environmentliliInterest in growing their skills as a Data Scientist and being willing to learn and teach as part of a teamliliStrong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goalsliliHigh motivation work ethic and selfdiscipline to organize and complete tasks brliulstrongCuriosity piqued
